title: Smart Data Models - Air quality observed schema
description: An observation of air quality conditions at a certain place and time.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be AirQualityObserved

dateObserved.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

areaServed.description: Property. Higher level area to which this air quality measurement belongs to. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

airQualityIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Air quality index is a number used to report the quality of the air on any given day.

reliability.description: Property. Reliability (percentage, expressed in parts per one) corresponding to the air quality observed. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

pm10.description: Property. Particulate matter 10 micrometers or less in diameter

pm25.description: Property. Particulate matter 2.5 micrometers or less in diameter

precipitation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount of water rain. Units:'Liters per square meter'.

relativeHumidity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Humidity in the Air

typeofLocation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of location of the sampled item

volatileOrganicCompoundsTotal.description: Property. Alkanes <C10, ketones <C6, aldehydes <C10, carboxylic acids <C5, aspirits<C7, Alkenes <C8, Aromatics

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. A reference to the device(s) which captured this observation.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refPointOfInterest.description: Relationship. A reference to a point of interest (usually an air quality station) associated to this observation.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refWeatherObserved.description: Relationship.  Weather observed associated to the air quality conditions described by this entity.

windDirection.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Direction of the weather vane

windSpeed.description: Property. Model:'http//schema.org/Number'. Intensity of the wind

pm1.description: Property. Particulate matter 1 micrometers or less in diameter.

relativeHumidity.description: Property. Relative Humidity of the air (a number between 0 and 1 representing the range of 0% to 100%)
